caption.p: Eggs per g soil of Globodera pallida and G. rostochiensis at 15, 22.5 and 25°C for cultivars Desiree and Maris Peer (a) and reduction in cysts/100 g soil, eggs per female and eggs/g soil from multiplication of G. pallida on seven cultivars at 22.5°C relative to the corresponding values at 15°C (b). Values are means ± SEM
